rules_text:
A hapless young man torn from a pampered life into a struggle for independence.
From birth, Suvic had a comfortable life; loving parents who worked to serve his needs, no want for food or drink, a tight-knit community he could always get along with, and contented faces wherever he went. This, unbeknownst to him, was the result of his birth as a sort of psychic vampire, devouring the negative emotions of those around him. Although he had his doubts about the whole situation, he was mostly happy to bury any uncomfortable self-scrutiny under enjoying himself.
However, suspicion slowly grew too nagging to overcome. As a young adult, Suvic started investigating his life in earnest, keeping precise track of his peers' reactions around him and far from him. When he discovered that protection from magic also dampened his effects on others, he came to a startling conclusion; he was some kind of mind-altering [i]thing,[/i] and the bonds and happiness he inspired in others may have all been completely fake. The epiphany shattered his perceptions of his life so intensely that it triggered his spark.
